wordGroup: excessive drinking 酗酒；过度饮酒
excessive consumption 过度消耗；超前消费
excessive pressure 剩余压力；过度压力
excessive noise 过度噪音；过分的吵闹声
excessive demand 过剩需求；过量需求；需求过旺
excessive production capacity 过剩生产能力

sentences.en: Excessive conformity is usually caused by fear of disapproval.
sentences.cn: 过分随大流通常是由于担心不被认同造成的。

sentences.en: Excessive pressure can lead to perforation of the stomach wall.
sentences.cn: 过大的压力会导致胃壁穿孔。

sentences.en: The police vigorously denied that excessive force had been used.
sentences.cn: 警方坚决否认曾过度使用武力。
